sentences.eng: – I see that the sun is shining.
– I feel that spring is in the air!
I see that everybody is jumping for joy.

sentences.eng: But I don’t understand why I should jump with everybody?!

At the moment I am sneezing and coughing non-stop!

But I don’t know how I can help you…

[просто|просто, всего лишь|just] [оставь меня в покое|оставь меня в покое|leave me alone],
